tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Fillings,RCT - Single Sitting,
review:
Dr Bharti is an honest & very caring /sensitive dentist, who puts his patients before his pocket & convenience.  Certainly, uncommon in today's medical ecosystem

1)  I went to Dr. Bharti to undo 2 botched bridge-work jobs done by my previous dentist. Dr Bharti suggested an option that was 3 times cheaper (compared to my previous Dentist - who had suggested drastic remedies) involving a lot less pain/trauma - to stabilize the bridges.  
2) Since I have a problem with keeping my jaws open for long periods of time, Dr Bharti himself offered to handle my case in multiple visits (around 6) instead of 3-4 just so that I did not have to deal with keeping my jaws open for long periods of time. He was very accommodative and sensitive to my situation.

I have already referred a friend to Dr Bharti for her dental issues and recommend him highly to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Finest dentist I have ever meet. Extremely friendly, ************* *** highly professional doctor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Finally the end of a long strive for more than a month. Many thanks to Dr. Anish Bharti, along with his two very able assistants 'Bipra' and 'Sushmita'.The length of time he spent with extraordinary patience and dedication, one by one, starting with the root canals of four teeth, correcting the planes of the teeth and finally finishing with my new denture, is really a treat to watch. He explained every step of the entire procedure, drawing pictures, taking multiple x'rays with perfect technical and medical explanations with fine details. In this country, we don't often see such interactions between doctor and patient, where the patient is also equally interested. Not only that, he repaired my old broken denture by his own hand with immaculate precision, without sending it to the Lab. 
His main area of specialization is implantolgy, however, he is equally good in other areas also. An ever smiling doctor with rare qualities and talent, I wish Dr. Anish Bharti many successes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
In today's world of medical bus. he is still a genuine doctor who takes his job sincerely and treat patient as a human, not just another case that is remarkable & genuinely appreciable.

He explained the dental condition well, guided the procedure with nitigreties and went with the care & understanding of the patients history & mental state.

He has promised too willing to extend his hands of help of hand through his acquenties doctor faternity in other cities where I am going to move for the implant in case need as he is supposed to provide his post procedure care**** ** *** ***** ** *** **** ********* ******* ***** ******* *** ** *** **** ** ***** ********* ****** ** **** ***** *** ** **** ******** *** **** ****** I can trust for his work and recommend based on my experience. 

Thank you doc & best of luck, stay in touch :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Bharti makes it his priority to make the patient comfortable as well as transparent about the problems faced. Though I just had an RCT, but the mobility of my tooth had caused great concern. Both Dr. Anish and Dr. Aditi were considerate enough to provide me with adequate time and treatment required for my tooth. They were always available to advise me whenever it was required. I am really thankful to both of them for trying every possible treatment to reduce my tooth pain and mobility. The best thing about them is that they feel it is very important to keep the patient well-informed about the ongoing treatment and future complications and possibilities.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I spent this semester on IIMC as an exchange student when I got toothache. Finally I found Dr. Anish Bharti on practo and based on the feedbacks he looked very sympathetic. I'm happy that he met my expectations: he was always on time, he put emphasis on explaining everything to me and he has a great knowledge and expreience. I felt the whole RCT happening very easy way and now I don't feel any pain. He was always available to advise me whenever it was required and he is also secured me that I can reach out to him with my questions once I return to Hungary.
Thank you Anish!
reply_text: Thanks for  appreciation and valuable feedback..

review: My treatment is ongoing. I approached him with tooth ache in a molar tooth which was recently filled. It is supposedly a difficult tooth anatomy and I was in discomfort and very concerned for some time, but Dr.Anish Bharti has very patiently treated me over multiple sessions and I am getting better. He has displayed professionalism and empathy. He arranged consultation on short notice when I was in immense pain on a Sunday. He explained to me all details of treatment after showing me all the tooth x-rays. I think he is a great doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was actually suffering from toothache and cavities from a very long time. I visited Dr. Anish bharti, at South City clinic, I was always fearful about dental treatments but ,thjis turned out to be the best dental experience of my life. I was truly taken care of by Dr. Anish bharti sir and his staffs are amazing, caring and professional people who make sure that you are comfortable and your needs are met. Dr. Anish bharti sir has a wonderful sense of humour and he is a very down to earth, that puts you at ease and makes your dental experience Wonderful. I am so happy that I met this Doctor. Will definitely recommend him to everyone. Thank you sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Bharti is very professional in his service . My mother is afraid of needles . But the way the anesthesia was applied by the doctor my mother couldn't feel it . Plus while explaining about the particular problem my mother was facing he really told everything in a brief . Even a person from non medical background would be able to understand about the problem . Plus the best thing about Dr. Bharti his how he deals with after services . It's the third time I'm visiting with my mother, whenever we call Dr. Bharti before booking an appointment it amazes me every time how he remembers all previous case history .

tags: None
review:
We both agreed upon joining my broken tooth using composite material. His wife first dropped the broken piece of my tooth on the floor which they picked up from under a table. Then while washing it over a sink, she dropped it through the sink-hole and lost it.

Although he built up the whole tooth with composite, Dr. Anish still charged me 1300 which was much more even after his exempted 'compensation'. ******* ************ *** unprofessionalism from the dentist.
reply_text:
dear souvik.
it is truly disheartening and demoralizing experience for doctor when they faced patient like you.
you are one of those kind of patients who always assume that doctors are overcharging without knowing facts.people like you can waste your money in frivolous thing,but not on doctor consultation fees.
you came with broken, dirty, chipped composite tooth and you agree that doctor build whole new tooth with composite,is that your problem?
you paid rs 1300  (composite restoration +consultation +x ray ) ,your so called exempted compensation then i am sorry to say you are those kind of people who are making doctors  profession miserable.
i remember 1st october durga puja holiday you called me and requested me for appointment as next day on 2nd october was also holiday.
first i was not agree but on your constant request that you are going out of station  and it is my front tooth, i came from 20km to see you.if you called this unprofessionalism, then i have doubt on your rationality and saneness.

tags: None
review: I got know about Dr. ANISH BHARTI through practo and i am glad that I visited him. My mother used to have a sever toothache she was not able to eat anything. She was reluctant for treatment due to her fear of injections. But Dr. BHARTI treated her so well that she is now fully releived of her toothache and is completely fine. I would recommend everyone to visit Dr. BHARTI as he is a good and caring dentist as well as a good human being.

review: i lost both my molar tooth at age of 20.since then i was wearing a removable denture. dr. anish discussed the benefit  of having tooth which is supported by implant.surgery was quite good .less painful then removal of tooth.the tooth that has been put on the implant gave me felling of natural tooth.very comfortable to eat ,no need to remove and confident that it wont come out during speech,recommend implant to the patient who lost their tooth.

Noticing that I walk with walking stick & have difficulty in climbing stairs, Dr. Anish Bharti was very kind and said not to come unless absolutely essential. He spoke with my aya equally respectfully & asked her to collect the denture so that I could try it out at home. When I went the 2nd time he advised the same.
The assistant staff were also very gentle & well behaved.

review:
It was much better and easier than I expected. I always heard horror stories of wisdom tooth extraction on how painful it is and how it hurts after. But I barely felt any pain, the tooth was out before I knew it and after following the doctor’s instruction on medicines to prevent infection and to eat certain food for a week or so. I was completely fine:

He did a great job and exceeded expectations.
